attributes.action: Ensure that foreign registered vehicles pay road tax and submit there vehicles to the MOT test and pay insurance if they intended to stay and work in this country for longer than 60 day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many foreign workers come to our country to work for a few years they bring there own cars to so they can get to and from work and live within the UK the same as everyone else how ever there vehicle only contribution to the tax system is fuel duty how ever if they bought a British resisted vehicle they are subject to they same requirements as we all have to so the proposal is this 

If the vehicle is to be used on British roads for longer than 60 days then the vehicle must apply for British road tax, M.O.T and insurance for this country

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
